casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Jimmy Lee FARMER 8A19-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 17, 2019 Jarvis John Edgerton, IV, Attorney at Law, for Farmer, Jimmy Lee. Anna M. Szamosi, Assistant Attorney General, Brandy Cook, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 15th of April 2019 by State of NC:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 17th of April 2019."
